item.title: PROGRESS ORDERS opening movie
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/progress-orders-opening-movie

  • PC
  • Switch

Featuring the theme song "Divine" by Ave Mujica.

Publisher Bushiroad Games and developer HAKAMA have released the opening movie for guild management fantasy RPG PROGRESS ORDERS. It features the theme song “Divine” by Ave Mujica.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bushiroad Games:

About

After finding a letter that was left behind, the protagonist arrives at the guild “Legion” in search of traces of their grandfather.

Although their grandfather was nowhere to be found, the protagonist ends up working at the guild in exchange for help in gathering information.

During the guild staff initiation ceremony, the protagonist acquires the ability of “clairvoyance,” allowing them to see and hear through the eyes of others.

With their new ability, the protagonist strengthens their bonds with the guild staff and adventurers, supporting their adventures from behind the scenes and guiding their requests to success.

Over time, Legion’s reputation grows, attracting many skilled adventurer parties to register with the guild.

Characters

  • Protagonist (Male) (voiced by Shinsuke Sugawara) (via) – A young man who becomes a guild assistant through unforeseen circumstances. He is honest and has a calm personality. During the guild initiation ceremony, he acquires the ability of “clairvoyance,” allowing him to see and hear through the eyes of others. This special power eventually leads to a major incident that threatens the fate of the world.
  • Protagonist (Female) (voiced by Yukari Anzai) (via) – A young woman who becomes a guild assistant through unforeseen circumstances. She is honest and has a calm personality. During the guild initiation ceremony, she acquires the ability of “clairvoyance,” allowing her to see and hear through the eyes of others. This special power eventually leads to a major incident that threatens the fate of the world.

PROGRESS ORDERS is due out for Switch and PC via Steam on April 10 in Japan for 2,970 yen.

Watch the opening movie below.

Opening Movie

item.title: KAMITSUBAKI CITY REGENERATE delayed to March 13
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/kamitsubaki-city-regenerate-delayed-to-march-13

  • PC
  • Switch

No longer due out on February 20.

Publisher and developer KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO, and developer Orange have delayed visual novel KAMITSUBAKI CITY REGENERATE from its previously planned February 20 release date to March 13. It will be available for Switch and PC via Steam with English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language support.

KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO said the delay was necessary in order to improve the game’s quality and provide players with a better experience.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

In a world parallel to our own resides the city of Kamitsubaki.

One day, the player, an “Observer,” is summoned to this ill-fated world.

There, they meet a girl named Kafu, and set out on a quest with her to save the world from its impending doom.

Key Features

KAMITSUBAKI CITY REGENERATE is a dark-fantasy science fiction visual novel taking place in “Kamitsubaki City.”

The city is brought to life with stunning illustrations and fully-voiced characters, each with their own unique sprites.

The game possesses the most extensive story in the series that cuts straight to the heart of Kamitsubaki City, featuring numerous popular songs from Kamitsubaki’s vocal artists that link to the plot and expand the scale of the world’s lore.

The player’s choices in Kamitsubaki City weave the story in vastly different directions. Observe the tale unfold as you harmonize with the characters and music and bear witness to the city’s ultimate fate.

*This game and KAMITSUBAKI CITY VIRTUAL REALITY share the same basic story. Furthermore, the story is standalone, meaning those unfamiliar with the series can play these games with no worries.

What is the KAMITSUBAKI CITY UNDER CONSTRUCTION series?

An original intellectual property project by KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO in development since 2019.

One of multiple story projects whose lore is linked to the studio’s vocal artists, starting with tales centered around the parallel world of Kamitsubaki City.

Cast

  • Kafu Morisaki (voiced by KAF)
  • Rime Tanioki (voiced by RIM)
  • Haru Asanushi (voiced by Harusaruhi)
  • Sekai Yorukawa (voiced by Isekaijoucho)
  • Koko Rinne (voiced by KOKO)
